name: F1 2015
description:
Experience all the thrills of racing in the world’s most glamorous, exciting and prestigious motorsport.

F1 2015 for Linux puts you at the heart of the action with a stunning game engine that recreates the blisteringly fast and highly responsive racing cars of FORMULA ONE™.

F1 2015 is the official videogame of the 2015 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™ and also features fully playable 2014 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™ bonus content. Compete as your favourite FORMULA ONE star and push yourself to the limit.
